text: Cuz in nest, ki misoli zindagii dunjo hamcun oʙest, ki az osmon furu rextem, pas, gijohoni [gunoguni] zamin az onci mardum va corpojon mexurand, ʙo on daromext [va rujid] to on goh ki zamin pirojai xudro [ʙo gulho va gijohon] ʙargirift va orosta sud va sokinonas pindostand, ki onon ʙar on tavonoie dorand [ki az mahsulotas ʙahramand gardand, vale nogahon] saʙe jo ruze farmoni [vajronii] Mo omad va on [kistu meva]-ro cunon darav kardem, ki gui diruz hec naʙudaast. Mo nisonaho[-i xud]-ro ʙaroi mardume, ki meandesand, incunin ʙa ravsani ʙajon mekunem
